file_content.text: It was an honor working with you, my lord. House Rist still trembles at your memory.
A pleasure as always, sir. Thanks to your efforts, Rist's gone quiet once more.
You served the Empire well. Rist assassins could learn from your example.
You're becoming a legend among Intelligence circles. Thank you for dispatching the Rist.
News of your actions is rippling across Alderaan. The Rist are wounded!
Excellent.
Yes. I have you to thank for everything. It's been a real honor.
Then I'm finished.
You're right. It's been an honor--I've always dreamed of working with you.
You should be more grateful.
You have my eternal appreciation! Still can't believe I got to meet you.
I'll continue monitoring Rist. If they plan to retaliate, we'll hear about it first.
Once you find the Rist ambush points, kill everyone.
What a pleasant surprise. I'm Officer Vesk, Imperial Intelligence. Been following your exploits for awhile now--I'm quite the fan.
Really wanted to hear how you took down Kai Saddek. Unfortunately, there's no time.
Wish we could discuss how you demolished Operation Sun Shower, but I can't waste another second.
I'd love to hear how you dealt with that traitor, Lord Cedarik Killesa, but I'm afraid there's no time.
I'd love to hear the details of your conquests, but I'm afraid there's no time.
House Rist is plotting to attack the Empire, and I've got the intel to prove it.
If the Rist oppose the Empire, they must be obliterated.
Annihilate them.
Purge the Rist from Alderaan. Destroy them completely.
Annihilate them.
I agree, my lord. That's why your arrival's so fortunate.
The Rist assaults are no match for the Empire's might.
Their plot will fail.
I'm glad you're so confident, sir. Perhaps you could help us.
I guess you want me to protect your precious Empire.
And you need my services.
That's right. Few produce such incredible results.
Who's House Rist?
House Rist?
They're a family of assassins, descended from an Exchange crime lord. We've been watching them closely.
The Rist are no threat.
As vassals to House Ulgo, pretenders to the throne, the Rist seek to wipe us out.
Members of their elite assassin squad are preparing to kill Thul and Imperial high commanders.
They're expendable, but a chance at killing some of Rist's greatest assassins is too good to pass up.
The assassins' bodies will be cold long before their targets arrive.
The Rist won't survive long.
That's the enthusiasm I've heard so much about.
I don't have all day.
Thank you! Time's already running short.
The Rist are already awaiting their prey. Find their ambush points, kill the assassins who lurk there.
Count me out. [Refuse quest]
I--I was sure you'd be eager to help. I must have been mistaken.
The Rist have gone quiet. What are they plotting?
